name: Joan Jump
description:
v0.3
  Hi ! Joan Jump is currently in early development stage. 
  
  'M'        : switch between QWERTY and AZERTY
  'A' or 'Q' : moving left 
  'D'        : moving right 
  'S'        : crouching (with bugs)
  'SHIFT'    : running
  'SPACE'    : jumping
  
  Press 'ENTER' to start, 
  
  Hope you'll enjoy :)
  
  
  https://gitlab.com/adelfaure/joan-jump
  contact@adelfaure.net
